value.title: FBI warns of increasing use of AI-generated deepfakes in sextortion schemes
value.excerpt: The FBI on Monday warned of the increasing use of artificial intelligence to generate phony videos for use in sextortion schemes that attempt to harass minors and non-consulting adults or coerce them into paying ransoms or complying with other demands.

value.title: Samsung's auto chip to power Hyundai Motor's infotainment starting in 2025
value.excerpt: Samsung said on Wednesday that it will be supplying its latest automotive processor to Hyundai Motor for the auto giant's new in-vehicle infotainment (IVI) systems launching in 2025. It is the South Korean tech giant's first collaboration on automotive semiconductors with Hyundai Motor, one of the largest automobile manufacturers in the world.
